headline: Here's Why UPS Stock Isn't Delivering Today
summary: Shares of package delivery giant UPS (NYSE: UPS) were down by 3.5% as of 1 p.m. today.  The sell-off coincides with an overall market decline, but some negative news from Delta Air Lines has also probably affected UPS.  Delta's management started the year expecting first-quarter revenue growth in the 7%-9% range.
